name: Elynas
desc: An Abyssal beast that appeared in Fontaine 500 years ago during the Cataclysm. Elynas is the "Father" of all Melusines.

imgDesc.text: A subspace created by Elynas to communicate with the Traveler.

customize.text: Relationships

customize.name: Melusines
customize.desc: Melusines are an all-female species born from the wounds of Elynas after he was injured from an explosion that took place within his petrified body. They once resided exclusively in Merusea Village, but after meeting the newly appointed Iudex Neuvillette, many can now be found on the surface of Fontaine as part of the Marechaussee Phantom.

customize.text: An intelligent race, which appeared roughly 400 years ago from Elynas's wounds, received in the battle between the Narzissenkreuz Ordo and Marechaussee Hunters. Elynas is the "Father" for all Melusines.

customize.name: Shatterstone Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

Receives a powerful shock from encountering ousia or pneuma energy, and thus Breacher Primuses can be driven away using this relatively nonaggressive and noninvasive means.

customize.name: Overgrown Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

In Fontaine, the earliest recorded observations of a Breacher Primus appeared shortly after the cataclysm. Records from the time show instances of Breacher Primuses both attacking and protecting humans.

customize.name: Large Shatterstone Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

Melusines perceive Breacher Primuses as harmless creatures, and many even find them completely adorable.

The visual perception of Melusines is very different from humans.

customize.name: Large Overgrown Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

The nature of a Breacher Primus defies known categories: they are not animals, plants, Shroom-Kin, nor Elementals. The debate among scholars of Sumeru never formally reached a consensus on just what it is, until it was finally banned as a research topic. The reason is that based on the current system of knowledge, this problem is like "the definitions prescribed by language and the true nature of things," and it is impossible to have a meaningful, final answer.

customize.text: Creatures which Elynas created to protect his daughters.

customize.name: Jakob
customize.desc: An orphan raised in the Narzissenkreuz Institute and later adopted by Karl Ingold. He became a Neohuman and the co-founder of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo.

customize.text: The Neohuman who enhanced his powers with Elynas's blood and flesh. He was a member of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo who fought with agents of Marechaussee Phantom.

customize.name: Mary-Ann Guillotin
customize.desc: The adopted daughter of Emanuel Guillotin and was raised in the Narzissenkreuz Institute with her brother Alain.

customize.name: Seymour
customize.desc: Prototype 4ACV07 is a mechanical dog created by Alain Guillotin to protect his sister Mary-Ann Guillotin during her service in the Marechaussee Phantom.

customize.text: Agents of Marechaussee Phantom who fought with the Narzissenkreuz Ordo inside Elynas's body.

customize.name: Lyris
customize.desc: The Director of the Narzissenkreuz Institute, an orphanage in Fontaine, she later became a member of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo and gained the title of "Red Empress" after the Institute was abandoned during the Cataclysm.

customize.name: Caterpillar
customize.desc: A member of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo given the title "Chrysalis of the Phantasmic Moth."

customize.text: Members of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo, who fought with Marechaussee Hunters.

customize.name: Rhinedottir
customize.desc: An alchemist, a member of the Hexenzirkel, one of the five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, and Albedo's mother. Rhinedottir created an army of shadowy monsters, who attacked Teyvat 500 years ago. She's also known as Gold and R.

customize.text: An Alchemist from Khaenri'ah who, most likely, is the Mother and creator of Elynas.

customize.name: Durin
customize.desc: The Shadow Dragon and one of Rhinedottir's children.

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Thundercraven Rifthound
customize.desc:
A beast with monstrous blood that is capable of eroding the boundaries of the world. They were created by "Gold."
Once upon a time, they ran riot across the continent, but they went extinct for a time due to resistance and mass hunts. Recently, however, they have re-emerged. The pack of black wolves that now threaten Springvale and Wolvendom are such creatures.

customize.name: Rockfond Rifthound
customize.desc:
A beast with monstrous blood that is capable of eroding the boundaries of the world. They were created by "Gold."
They do display certain biological behaviors similar to those of real wolves. Perhaps they feel jealousy towards these their "next of kin," and dream of replacing them someday.

customize.name: Rockfond Rifthound Whelp
customize.desc:
A beast with monstrous blood that is capable of eroding the boundaries of the world. "Gold" classified them as "Alfisol."
They follow the encroaching abyss to devour the elements. Fortunately, there are few of them left now in this world.

customize.name: Thundercraven Rifthound Whelp
customize.desc:
A beast with monstrous blood that is capable of eroding the boundaries of the world. "Gold" classified them as "Alfisol."
The previous eras, when giant monstrous beasts descended, large swarms of these hounds would go before them to deliquesce the borders of the world and open the way.

customize.name: Golden Wolflord
customize.desc:
Hailing from a dark world, this ruler of the black wolves has the power to call upon its followers, its hidden claws, to dissolve space itself and forge a rift through which it may enter.
The Wolflord has no name, for it was but one of "Gold"'s unintentional creations, and that is precisely why it is obsessed with invading worlds that do not belong to it and making a name for itself.
That said, the wolf pack is far from unintelligent. After suffering a defeat in its previous invasion, a deserted island where no humans or protectors dwell has been selected for them to prepare for their lord's descent.

customize.text: Other Rhinedottir's creations and, most likely, Elynas's siblings.
Related Items

customize.name: Red Stone
customize.desc:
Red ore that you collected together with Mamere. It is said that the ore can be used to make paint.

For some reason, even though it's just an ore, it almost feels warm... Is your hand too cold?

customize.name: Enigmatic Page (II)
customize.desc:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.

Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

customize.name: Enigmatic Page (III)
customize.desc:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.

Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

customize.name: Enigmatic Page (V)
customize.desc:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.

Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

customize.name: Enigmatic Page (XIII)
customize.desc:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.

Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

customize.text: Elynas's Birth

Before he was born, Elynas floated in the cosmic darkness in cold and loneliness. He was so sad, so he would often cry. Later he heard Mother's voice, who wished for Elynas to be born into a beautiful world. She gave him life, a strong and healthy body that could walk the world, and a beautiful name. She wanted to give him many siblings, to meet many friends, and to see the beautiful sights beyond that cosmic dark. Elynas and his siblings loved and cared for each other.
Later, Elynas along with his siblings left the world beneath the earth. He felt the wind brushing against his skin, the warmth of the sun, waters icy and warm. At first, Elynas was happy, but he soon discovered that what seemed interesting and funny to him was scary and dangerous for others. He learned that his blood was poisoned and that he was bringing suffering and destruction to the people of Teyvat, but it was too late.
Judging by the fact that Elynas blood is similar in composition to the Shadow Dragon Durin’s blood, that they both referred to the creator as Mother and they both have the same goal when they entered Teyvat, it can be assumed that Elynas and Durin have the same creator — the alchemist Rhinedottir, also known as Gold. She is the mother of Durin, Albedo and many other Abyssal beasts, and also one of the reasons for the Cataclysm.
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.text: Elynas's Death and Melusines’ Birth

Elynas appeared in Fontaine during the Cataclysm 500 years ago. Its existence poisoned the water and land, so the Fontaine fleet, led by Basil Elton on her ship Sponsian, was sent to protect Fontaine from Elynas. They chased the Abyssal beast for about 35 days, constantly fighting other Abyssal monsters. When most of the fleet's ships were sunk, the Sponsian flagship was significantly damaged, and Elynas himself was wounded, the Sponsian overtook the beast. As a result of the battle, the ship was split in two, and one half was stuck in Elynas's body. The second half can still be seen in the waters near Elton Trench, floating like a ghost.

Realizing that he only brought destruction and suffering, Elynas decided to stop fighting and die. He was filled with sorrow, but yet was glad it was all over. Although his body and heart were petrified, he still retained consciousness and was therefore glad when people appeared in his body more than 400 years ago. It was Jakob Ingold and Rene de Petrichor, who used the flesh and blood of Elynas to research and improve the powers of the first Neohuman Jakob. But one day, many other creatures appeared in his body, including metal machines, a spirit of the primordial waters and other people. There was a battle and an explosion inside Elynas's body that damaged his flesh, and from these wounds the Melusines, Elynas's children, were born. Each Melusine was born with a shard of broken Mek, so they began considering these objects as their "token," which must be protected. To protect himself and his daughters, Elynas created the Breacher Primuses, unusual living creatures that are neither plants nor animals. They were less intellectually developed than the Melusines themselves, but some Melusines began to care for them as their pets.

<color=#ffffffd9>"I was so overjoyed, for they were beautiful and intelligent. Also, that was when I realized that I could do more than destroy — I could bring beautiful new life into this world."</color>

Elynas loved his daughters so much and considered them beautiful. He often talked to them and taught them how to build a home for themselves so that they might grow up well. Then, there was happiness and liveliness everywhere. The Melusines founded the Merusea village inside the Elynas's body, in which they lived for many years. Centuries later, almost all Melusines, except one, Mamere, lost the opportunity to communicate with their "Father" and forgot about him. Some began to consider him a caring "mother," while others simply do not remember their origins.
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Beryl Region
customize.desc:
An ancient ruin-studded mountain range across the water from the Court of Fontaine.

Many, many centuries ago, the followers of Egeria once saw this place as a prime location for excursions and picnics. Gathered here, they sang of love and dreams as pure and stainless as polished gems. Their songs have long faded into the pale moonlight, and now, only cool breezes continue to caress these lonely, mint-studded highlands.

customize.name: Melusines
customize.desc: Melusines are an all-female species born from the wounds of Elynas after he was injured from an explosion that took place within his petrified body. They once resided exclusively in Merusea Village, but after meeting the newly appointed Iudex Neuvillette, many can now be found on the surface of Fontaine as part of the Marechaussee Phantom.

customize.name: The Narzissenkreuz Ordo
customize.desc: The Narzissenkreuz Ordo is the secret society formed by Rene de Petrichor and Jakob Ingold to create Neohumans in order to survive against the destruction of the world as foretold by the world-formula. It was declared an illegal extremist group and a criminal organization by Fontainian law under Iudex Neuvillette.

customize.name: Basil Elton
customize.desc: Basil was a retired admiral of the Fontaine Armada, Captain of the Sponsian, and Vice Director of the Narzissenkreuz Institute. She died 500 years ago during the Cataclysm.

customize.name: Narzissenkreuz
customize.desc: The leader of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo, formerly known as Rene de Petrichor.

customize.name: Jakob
customize.desc: An orphan raised in the Narzissenkreuz Institute and later adopted by Karl Ingold. He became a Neohuman and the co-founder of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo.

customize.name: Mamere
customize.desc: A Melusine artist who lives in Merusea Village.

customize.text: Ancient Colors

Elynas only met two people who could resist his poison: Jakob Ingold and the Traveler. While he was glad to help Jakob as he fueled his powers with the Elynas’s flesh and blood, he did not want his heart to be revived again. Elynas was afraid that his daughters would die, and their small houses would be destroyed, so he was grateful to the Traveler for stopping Jakob. In gratitude, he asked his daughter Mamere to paint a picture with his blood, which allowed Elynas to meet the Traveler. As a farewell, he conveyed a message to Mamere and wished to meet the Traveler again.

<color=#ffffffd9>Could you tell Mamere... Hmm, what to say… How about this, then? "Your paintings are very beautiful. I love you, and I'm so very proud of you." Ah, right, and "please get along with your sisters — they love you very much as well." Alright then, thank you! Honestly, it was great meeting you. Someday, I hope that I'll be able to traverse this world without fear of causing harm or death to others. When that time comes, I'll be sure to show you what I really look like!</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>
